name: Self Shot (itch) (S-Cov)
description:
Your Plane moves towards the cursor. There is a little timer above your plane. When the timer runs out, you shoot a bullet. Bullets bounce off of walls infinitely. If you get hit by a bullet, you lose. If a bullet hits another bullet, they both get destroyed. You get +1 point for every bullet shot and for every bullet destroyed.

The shoot rate increases after every shot. The shoot rate speed is indicated by a bar in the top left corner of the screen.

Survive as long as you can!

The plane moves towards the mouse

M - mute/unmute music

S - mute/unmute sound effects

F - switch fullscreen 

ESC - exit game 

Originally made for Brackeys Jam 2021.2, but I messed up with the files when uploading so it's not for the jam anymore...
